498940.name: WarBirds Dawn of Aces, World War I Air Combat
498940.description:
WarBirds Dawn of Aces 2026 is a World War I, 1914-1918, combat flight simulation game that allows you to fly and fight in Single Player missions or in Massively Multiplayer Online battles against human pilots in air-to-air combat. WarBirds Dawn of Aces 2026 generates thousands of unique single player missions and at the same time allows players who want to battle human opponents to come online in the WarBirds TotalSims online game arenas.

 

WarBirds Dawn of Aces 2026 is a classic simulation of single player World War I air-to-air combat simulation with thousands of unique combat missions in Solo play! WarBirds Dawn of Aces 2026 features flight models that allow you to control over 25 historical aircraft versions.

  • WarBirds Dawn of Aces 2026 teaches real aircraft flying and maneuvering skills.

  • Players can participate in full training with real maneuvers to practice and train.

  • WarBirds Dawn of Aces 2026 features advancement scoring where players can advance from novice to WGFP, (World's Greatest Fighter Pilot), through a series of promotions and rank awards.

 

WarBirds Dawn of Aces 2026 has hundreds of single player missions including: Training Missions–Learn the cockpit, takeoffs, bombing and strafing, dogfighting, and bringing your aircraft home; Instant Action Missions–Jump into one of 10 different missions where the fight is on, Air to Air, and Air to Ground; Campaign Missions–A Series of historical missions leading up to the success or failure of the air battle over the trenches and a confrontation with the famous Red Baron von Richthofen!

Fly Fokker’s, Spad XIIs, and other biplane Fighter and Bomber aircraft in a series of increasingly challenging missions to grow your rank and medals.

Your WarBirds, Dawn of Aces 2026, also can be played Online as a World War II simulator, with P-51D Mustangs, B-17 Flying Fortresses, and all Allied and Axis aircraft of WW II, online Forever FREE! Or participate Online in Armored Assault events with weapons like the German Tiger Tanks or the American M4 Sherman tank.

 

Each mission is all action. Each terrain is different. There are over 20 different large-scale air battle terrains set in historic battle areas around the world. Each of these battles has separate procedural generation systems:

  • North Africa (Tobruk and Tunisia)

  • Europe (from Battle of Britain to Battle over Germany)

  • The Pacific (Midway, South Pacific atolls, Philippines)

  • Western Russia

WarBirds Dawn of Aces Pilots can participate in online historical events held on most Sunday nights at 2030 Hrs, New York City USA time.

Recently these Pilots participated in events like, “Battle of Midway,” “Battle of Coral Sea,” “Battle of Britain,” “B-17 Flying Fortresses over Occupied Europe,” “Bloody April (1914),” and other historical events.

Players can play ONLINE for FREE during a 30-day period after Downloading Dawn of Aces 2026 in the TotalSims online arenas with ALL aircraft available to fly!

After the 30-day FREE trial, players can still play online for FREE with six early combat aircraft including the Spitfire 1, the Bf-109B, a B-25 Bomber, Ju-52 troops transport, and one tank.

You can also purchase limited time passes or can set up a monthly subscription, to access all 225 aircraft and ground vehicles, plus special events and battle spaces.

With MMO Online Play, players can join the Squadron of their choice or battle against other air combat enthusiasts in our massively multiplayer online game, WarBirds 2026 Online.

 

WarBirds Dawn of Aces 2026 is a Simulation and Strategy game from iEntertainment Network, INC., (OTCID: IENT).  A Public company whose Team has developed over 250 successful simulation and strategy games and sold over 300 million copies worldwide, including Sid Meier’s Civilization, M1 Tank Platoon, iF-22 Raptor, F-117 Stealth Fighter, Silent Service, WarBirds, and many more great games.

 

Salute and Check Six!
